page.title: 09FASHION IN CHARD
page.content: Fashion takes a while to get from the big cities to Chard. The boys fashion now is baggies (trousers),tight jeans,Tshirts and denim jackets.Shoes are strappy or lace ups and trainers.They like the colours blue,grey,black and white. The girls fashion is tight skirts, tight jeans,baggies(trousers),batwing jumpers and drop-shoulder jumpers. Shoes are flat,pointed and simple. The colours are pastels,red,black, grey and white.The earrings are big and dangly. {EATING PLACES: There are eight eating places in Chard area. The Hornsbury Mill,Copper Kettle ,Chinese,Cobweb and Whites,Teashoppe and Bath House and Palmers. These eating places are in order of popularity, according to the results of a survey taken on June 6th 1985.
